long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An afterhours project for Wonderlabz

Current Features:
- Live validation of Merge Requests (following simplified rules and current conventions)
- Quick link to PLAT and LSPLAT numbers
- View demo videos in MR's
- Fancy reminders in Tempo for weekly and monthly timesheet submissions
- PLAT Ticket Verification
- Extension Dark style
- Dark theme for Jira (LS & Atlassian)
- Animated CSS Loaders
- Added 'Changes' checking for MR's
- Easter Eggs!
- Dedicated config pages where necessary
